genre: 英検 5級・4級 入門レベル

questions.question: What time is it?
questions.explanation: 時刻を「It is + 時間」で答える。5級・4級では基本的な時刻表現が重要。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: What time is it?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 時刻を「It is + 時間」で答える。5級・4級では基本的な時刻表現が重要。...]

questions.question: How many _____ are there on the table?
questions.explanation: How many + 複数名詞が正い形。"apples"のように複数形を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: How many _____ are there on the table?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: How many + 複数名詞が正い形。"apples"のように複数形を使う。...]

questions.question: My sister ___ to school every day.
questions.explanation: 3人称単数現在形にはsをつける。"My sister goes..."が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: My sister ___ to school every day....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 3人称単数現在形にはsをつける。"My sister goes..."が正い。...]

questions.question: Do you like ___?
questions.explanation: like + V-ingが基本形。"Do you like playing tennis?"が正しい。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Do you like ___?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: like + V-ingが基本形。"Do you like playing tennis?"が正しい...]

questions.question: I ___ eat breakfast this morning.
questions.explanation: 過去の否定は"didn't + 動詞の原形"。"I didn't eat breakfast..."が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I ___ eat breakfast this morning....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 過去の否定は"didn't + 動詞の原形"。"I didn't eat breakfast..."...]

questions.question: What is your favorite sport?
questions.explanation: "What is your favorite + 名詞?"という質問に対して、"My favorite + 名詞 + is ~"で答える。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: What is your favorite sport?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "What is your favorite + 名詞?"という質問に対して、"My favorit...]

questions.question: She ___ been to Tokyo before.
questions.explanation: 現在完了形は"have/has + 過去分詞"。3人称単数は"has"を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: She ___ been to Tokyo before....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 現在完了形は"have/has + 過去分詞"。3人称単数は"has"を使う。...]

questions.question: Can I ___ you a question?
questions.explanation: Can + 原形。"Can I ask you a question?"が正しい聞き方。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Can I ___ you a question?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: Can + 原形。"Can I ask you a question?"が正しい聞き方。...]

questions.question: I went to the supermarket ___ buy bread.
questions.explanation: 目的を表すtoを使う。"to buy bread"で"パンを買うために"という意味。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I went to the supermarket ___ buy bread....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 目的を表すtoを使う。"to buy bread"で"パンを買うために"という意味。...]

questions.question: This book is ___ than that one.
questions.explanation: 比較級は"more + 形容詞"。"This book is more interesting than that one."が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: This book is ___ than that one....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 比較級は"more + 形容詞"。"This book is more interesting th...]

questions.question: Where is the nearest ___?
questions.explanation: 修飾関係は"post office"。名詞+名詞の組み合わせで複合名詞を作る。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Where is the nearest ___?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 修飾関係は"post office"。名詞+名詞の組み合わせで複合名詞を作る。...]

questions.question: I don't like ___ very much.
questions.explanation: don't like + V-ing。"reading"がgetする形。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I don't like ___ very much....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: don't like + V-ing。"reading"がgetする形。...]

questions.question: _____ usually have lunch at 12 o'clock?
questions.explanation: 普通の習慣を聞くなら"Do you...?"を使う現在形。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: _____ usually have lunch at 12 o'clock?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 普通の習慣を聞くなら"Do you...?"を使う現在形。...]

questions.question: He ___ play soccer because he injured his leg.
questions.explanation: 能力がない場合は"can't"を使う。怪我のため遊べない理由。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: He ___ play soccer because he injured his leg....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 能力がない場合は"can't"を使う。怪我のため遊べない理由。...]

questions.question: I have ____ do my homework.
questions.explanation: have to + 原形で"しなければならない"。"I have to do..."が正い表現。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I have ____ do my homework....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: have to + 原形で"しなければならない"。"I have to do..."が正い表現。...]

questions.question: What does "sunny" mean?
questions.explanation: "sunny"は晴れた、明るいという意味。天気の表現を理解する必要がある。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: What does "sunny" mean?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "sunny"は晴れた、明るいという意味。天気の表現を理解する必要がある。...]

questions.question: Are you ___ in sports?
questions.explanation: "be interested in ~"で"~に興味がある"という意味。過去分詞を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Are you ___ in sports?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "be interested in ~"で"~に興味がある"という意味。過去分詞を使う。...]

questions.question: I prefer coffee ___ tea.
questions.explanation: "prefer A to B"で"AはBより好き"という比較表現を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I prefer coffee ___ tea....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "prefer A to B"で"AはBより好き"という比較表現を使う。...]

questions.question: My parents ___ cooking dinner at 6 PM.
questions.explanation: "parents"は複数形なので"are"を使う。"My parents are cooking..."が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: My parents ___ cooking dinner at 6 PM....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "parents"は複数形なので"are"を使う。"My parents are cooking.....]

questions.question: This is ___ most beautiful place I have ever seen.
questions.explanation: 最高級は定冠詞"the"を伴う。"the most beautiful"が正い形。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: This is ___ most beautiful place I have ever seen....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 最高級は定冠詞"the"を伴う。"the most beautiful"が正い形。...]

questions.question: If I ___ you, I would study abroad.
questions.explanation: 仮定法過去は"If I were..."という非現実的な仮定を表す。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: If I ___ you, I would study abroad....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 仮定法過去は"If I were..."という非現実的な仮定を表す。...]

questions.question: She said that she ___ come to the party.
questions.explanation: 間接話法で過去の話を述べるときは"would"を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: She said that she ___ come to the party....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 間接話法で過去の話を述べるときは"would"を使う。...]

questions.question: I ___ my keys. Do you see them?
questions.explanation: 最近失くして、今見つからない状態は現在完了形"have lost"を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I ___ my keys. Do you see them?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 最近失くして、今見つからない状態は現在完了形"have lost"を使う。...]

questions.question: The museum is open ___ 9 AM ___ 5 PM.
questions.explanation: "from A to B"で時間幅を表す。"from 9 AM to 5 PM"が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The museum is open ___ 9 AM ___ 5 PM....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "from A to B"で時間幅を表す。"from 9 AM to 5 PM"が正い。...]

questions.question: I would like ___ you to my birthday party.
questions.explanation: "would like + to不定詞"で"したい''という誘いの表現。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I would like ___ you to my birthday party....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "would like + to不定詞"で"したい''という誘いの表現。...]

questions.question: My friend bought a new car. We _____ it yesterday.
questions.explanation: 昨日という過去の時点の話なので過去形"drove"を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: My friend bought a new car. We _____ it yesterday....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 昨日という過去の時点の話なので過去形"drove"を使う。...]

questions.question: Unless you study hard, you ___ pass the exam.
questions.explanation: "Unless"は"if not"の意味で、否定の主張。"won't pass"が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Unless you study hard, you ___ pass the exam....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "Unless"は"if not"の意味で、否定の主張。"won't pass"が正い。...]

questions.question: She is known ___ her excellent music skills.
questions.explanation: "be known for ~"で"~で知られている''という意味。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: She is known ___ her excellent music skills....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "be known for ~"で"~で知られている''という意味。...]

questions.question: The package ___ delivered tomorrow morning.
questions.explanation: 未来のことの受動態は"will be + 過去分詞''。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The package ___ delivered tomorrow morning....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 未来のことの受動態は"will be + 過去分詞''。...]

questions.question: I haven't seen her ___ last month.
questions.explanation: "since + 時点''で"その時からずっと''という完了形の時間表現。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I haven't seen her ___ last month....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "since + 時点''で"その時からずっと''という完了形の時間表現。...]

questions.question: The children were playing in the park ___ it started raining.
questions.explanation: "when''は"~した時に''と瞬間を表す接続詞として使われる。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The children were playing in the park ___ it start...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "when''は"~した時に''と瞬間を表す接続詞として使われる。...]

questions.question: I would have called you, but I didn't have your ___.
questions.explanation: 電話番号は''phone number''という複合名詞の正しい順序。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I would have called you, but I didn't have your __...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 電話番号は''phone number''という複合名詞の正しい順序。...]

questions.question: The teacher explained the lesson ___ the students understood it well.
questions.explanation: "so that + 文''で"~するために''と目的を表す。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The teacher explained the lesson ___ the students ...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "so that + 文''で"~するために''と目的を表す。...]

questions.question: She graduated ___ high school last year.
questions.explanation: "graduate from ~''で"~を卒業する''という意味。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: She graduated ___ high school last year....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "graduate from ~''で"~を卒業する''という意味。...]

questions.question: What would you do if you ___ a million dollars?
questions.explanation: If節の仮定法過去は過去形"won''を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: What would you do if you ___ a million dollars?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: If節の仮定法過去は過去形"won''を使う。...]

questions.question: I'll be there ___ 3 o'clock.
questions.explanation: 時刻を指定するときは''at''を使う。''at 3 o'clock''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I'll be there ___ 3 o'clock....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 時刻を指定するときは''at''を使う。''at 3 o'clock''が正い。...]

questions.question: Neither of my friends ___ able to attend the meeting.
questions.explanation: "Neither of + 複数名詞''は単数扱いで"is''を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Neither of my friends ___ able to attend the meeti...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "Neither of + 複数名詞''は単数扱いで"is''を使う。...]

questions.question: She asked me ___ I had finished my work.
questions.explanation: "if''は間接疑問で"かどうか''と肯否を聞く。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: She asked me ___ I had finished my work....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "if''は間接疑問で"かどうか''と肯否を聞く。...]

questions.question: The more you practice, ___ you become.
questions.explanation: "The more ... the ...''で相関比較を表す。"the better''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The more you practice, ___ you become....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "The more ... the ...''で相関比較を表す。"the better''が正い。...]

questions.question: I couldn't understand what he said because of his ___ accent.
questions.explanation: 形容詞が必要で、''strong accent''で"強なまり''という意味。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I couldn't understand what he said because of his ...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 形容詞が必要で、''strong accent''で"強なまり''という意味。...]

questions.question: The company has ___ its business to three countries.
questions.explanation: "has + 過去分詞''の現在完了形。"has expanded''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The company has ___ its business to three countrie...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "has + 過去分詞''の現在完了形。"has expanded''が正い。...]

questions.question: I suggest that he ___ his appointment.
questions.explanation: "suggest that''の後は原形を使う。"he confirm''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I suggest that he ___ his appointment....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "suggest that''の後は原形を使う。"he confirm''が正い。...]

questions.question: The boy ___ to school is my brother.
questions.explanation: 分詞構文で"to school''に向かっているは現在分詞"going''を使う。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The boy ___ to school is my brother....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 分詞構文で"to school''に向かっているは現在分詞"going''を使う。...]

questions.question: It's getting cold. I think it ___ rain soon.
questions.explanation: 近い未来の記述として''will''が基本だが、は''is going to''も使える。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: It's getting cold. I think it ___ rain soon....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 近い未来の記述として''will''が基本だが、は''is going to''も使える。...]

questions.question: After _____ dinner, we went for a walk.
questions.explanation: "After + V-ing''で"~の後で''と時間関係を表す。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: After _____ dinner, we went for a walk....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "After + V-ing''で"~の後で''と時間関係を表す。...]

questions.question: I've been working here ___ five years.
questions.explanation: 期間を表すは"for + 期間''。"for five years''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I've been working here ___ five years....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 期間を表すは"for + 期間''。"for five years''が正い。...]

questions.question: He was sick, ___ he didn't go to school.
questions.explanation: 原因と結果の関係なら"so''で"だから''という接続詞。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: He was sick, ___ he didn't go to school....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 原因と結果の関係なら"so''で"だから''という接続詞。...]

questions.question: The price of houses has _____ recently.
questions.explanation: "has + 過去分詞''で現在完了形。"has increased''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: The price of houses has _____ recently....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "has + 過去分詞''で現在完了形。"has increased''が正い。...]

questions.question: Which do you prefer, tea ___ coffee?
questions.explanation: 選択肢を示すは''or''を使う。"tea or coffee''が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: Which do you prefer, tea ___ coffee?...]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: 選択肢を示すは''or''を使う。"tea or coffee''が正い。...]

questions.question: I'm looking forward ___ seeing you this weekend.
questions.explanation: "look forward to + V-ing''で''楽しみにしている''という意味が正い。
questions.ja_question: [Japanese translation needed: I'm looking forward ___ seeing you this weekend....]
questions.ja_explanation: [Japanese translation needed: "look forward to + V-ing''で''楽しみにしている''という意味が正い。...]
